Desc.entry: Private residential care home with an EMI unit. 40 beds of which 25 are residential and 15 are for Elderly Mentally Infirm (EMI). Arranges social activities and encourages residents to be independent. Also provides day care. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
